**Join us for social coworking as Openscapes and rOpenSci come together** November 5, 9:00 - 11:00 am PT ([find your local time](https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=2024-11-05T17%3a00%3a00&ah=2&msg=Social%20Coworking%20and%20Office%20Hours%20-%20Getting%20to%20know%20Openscapes))!

These social coworking sessions are so much fun! Read [All About Coworking Sessions with rOpenSci](https://ropensci.org/blog/2023/06/21/coworking/). This time it's team [Stef](https://openscapes.org/team) (Openscapes) + [Steffi](https://ropensci.org/author/steffi-lazerte/) (rOpenSci) co-hosting.
